## Source: ossf-package-analysis (56cc1b64c67e70b3f66eebf4c97477cd4856977e86b931400432f4ec14cb6e2d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@3kali182/angular-1.6' @ 9.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
